name: Trump's Fall
description:
Donald Trump has gone too far this time around. The entirety of America want's him dead. Luckily he remember the worldwide tunnel he dug all the way to China previously. Grab your gun and help Trump escape through the tunnel while fending off all the aliens that occupy it.
